page.title: 12HOUSING WINTERBOURNE VALLEY
page.content: 20 houses in ribbon development along B3159, with a mixture of old thatched cottages some dating from the C16, and modern houses & bungalows. 6 scattered farm houses and some other houses well spread out.Housing is of good standard in good repair and with hot and cold water and indoor sanitation.Nearly all have gardens. New buildings usually of stone or reconstructed stone are limited and strictly controlled to blend in with the landscape and not to spoil the village atmosphere. {HOME OWNERSHIP} About 50% with farmers living in tied cottages. No rented accommodation apart from four cottages let during the holiday period. Some bed and breakfast accommodation. {MANOR HOUSES}(Winterbourne) Steepleton Manor being tastefully converted to a Rest Home, and family owned Rew Manor, both standing in their own grounds.
